seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
||Who is the highest voted resistence leader during dante's reign?||
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_

**Seraphone says:**
What is a crop that grows infinity from one seed?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
seraphine_questions.footer: Seraphine says: What is the crop that can grow up to three blocks?

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphone says:**
||Type out the name of that npc below!||
seraphine_questions.footer: TommyInnit came up with the idea of 'Aspect of the (npc name)'!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphany says:**
Whats is the name of the npc who host the dojo?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
seraphine_questions.footer: Seraphine says: Which npc work as a clerk in the community center?

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
An item has the lore: ```In the mist of chaos, there is also opportunity```What is the item?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
fields: B. Basket of Hope from the Great Potato War
seraphine_questions.footer: He is but a puppet, and I the puppeteer; DANCE POTATO BOY DANCE!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Sepaphine says:**
There are 4 mining tools below, which one does not exist?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
seraphine_questions.footer: Seraphine says: Which of those mining tools above are the best?

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
||What spawns once every 2 hours on the island below?||
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
seraphine_questions.footer: There is a disturbance, this island has disappeared...

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
What item this poem is referring to?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
```A blocky worker in the sky,
It mines and mines until you're nigh.
With Krampus helm, it brings good cheer,
Diamonds and presents, oh so dear.

But wait, there's more it has to give,
Mining exp for as long as you live.
With diamond spreading, yields increase,
This little worker, a mining masterpiece.```
seraphine_questions.footer: Minions are not child labour, they 100% do it voluntarily!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
||Is bert an npc on hypixel?||
_(answer with `yes` or `no`)_

**Seraphine says:**
||Which admin is famous for giving out this item below?||
seraphine_questions.footer: A rare space helmet forged from shards of moon glass... You can get it from the spaceman npc too!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
How do you obtain the golden ball reforge stone in hypixel?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
[The methods they tried to get the golden ball...](https://hypixel.net/threads/found-current-ideas-tested-on-cowshed.4230149/)
fields: A. Combining beach ball and gold ingot in anvil
B. Shearing all sheep on farming island
C. Speaking to treasure hunter 250 times
D. Bring a sea emperor to jake
seraphine_questions.footer: The great hunt of the golden ball!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
||How often does dark auction happens||
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
seraphine_questions.footer: C418 - Stal was the name of the song played in the dark auction!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Serapinou says:**
Some pets uses special items to tier them up to mythic, which item below is fake?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
seraphine_questions.footer: Seraphine says: Which item is used on Jerry?

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
What didn't happen to the 7 shiny relics used to power the Blood God Shrine?
_(Answer with A, B, C, or D)_
fields: A. Stored in an ender chest
C. Wiped due to duper purchasing them
D. In an inactive player's inventory
seraphine_questions.footer: 4 of the shiny relics are wiped due to the same duper...
The ground starts to shake and the lava bubbles...

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
In spooky festival, green candy gives one point in the leaderboard,
How many points do you get for every purple candy?
seraphine_questions.footer: During Halloween irl, additional Spooky Festival are organised!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Seraphine says:**
What fact below is false about the stock of stonks?
fields: A. Sold for 200 coins for one day
B. Used to test the bazzar
C. The npc who sell it is still in the game
D. It was intended to be valueless
seraphine_questions.footer: stonk of stonks to the moon!

seraphine_questions.description:
**Serapapa says:**
What item below is the rarest from the reward chest of infernal tier Kuddra?
fields: C. A god roll aurora piece
seraphine_questions.footer: Searphine says: What instead is the most common from above?
